metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6814 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.7.3, there is authenticated Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via Media File Metadata. This is demonstrated by both (1) mishandling of the playlist shortcode in the wp_playlist_shortcode function in wp-includes/media.php and (2) mishandling of meta information in the renderTracks function in wp-includes/js/mediaelement/wp-playlist.js.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-6814` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.7.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required
